creator: Douglas, George, 1825-1894. (author)
description: Douglas, George: 1825-1894. Born in Scotland; to Canada with parents, 1832; ordained Methodist clergy, 1850; served in Bermuda, Montreal, Kingston, Ontario, Toronto, and Hamilton, Ontario; appointed principal Wesleyan Theological College, Montreal, 1864 (Wallace, Dictionary of Canadian biography). // Caption-title: "Memorial of the late Rev. George McDougall, by Rev. Dr Douglass [sic]."
